------------------------------------------------------------------------
This file, glx.xml, is the GLX API Registry. The canonical version of the registry, together with documentation, schema, and Python generator scripts used to generate C header files for GLX, can always be found in the Khronos Registry at https://github.com/KhronosGroup/OpenGL-Registry

enum.name: GLX_EXTENSION_NAME
enum.comment: This is modest abuse of the enum tag mechanism, maybe a string tag?

enums.comment: Returned in the evtype field of XGenericEventCookie requests. This is a numeric code, not a bitmask. See http://www.x.org/releases/X11R7.6/doc/xextproto/geproto.html
Miscellaneous OpenGL 1.0/1.1 enums. Most parts of this range are unused and should remain unused.
Tokens whose numeric value is intrinsically meaningful
Shared with WGL; synchronize create_context enums
Shared with WGL; synchronize create_context enums

unused.comment: Reserved for future use. Reserve enums in blocks of 16 from the start.

enums.comment: Values shared with GL. Do not allocate additional values in this range.
RESERVED FOR FUTURE ALLOCATIONS BY KHRONOS
Visual attributes for multisampling. Historical range only; do not allocate new values in this space.

type.name: GLXContextID
type.comment: Required here so it doesn't collide with Mesa glx.h (Bug 11454)
